channel.title: cog-wheel train on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in cog-wheel train on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Mount Jungfraujoch - 23rd June
item.description: Top of Europe Today we woke up very early as to move towards our next destination Interlaken (means between two lakes). I immediately peered out the window to check out what the weather was like. I was very concerned about our trip to Mt. Jungfrau. But to me it seems to be a perfect day. Santanu was bit hesitant as it was cloudy & gloomy all the way while coming down from Mt.

item.title: Hiking Mt.Rigi - 22nd June
item.description: Queen of Swiss Mountains From Zurich we went to Mt. Rigi via Arth-Goldau a very short train ride. From there we took the cogwheel train to the summit at Rigi-Kulm (1,800m). Incredible vistas, typical Swiss farmhouses, and hundreds of cows with bells will surprise one throughout the trip. Reward on going to top is magnificent panorama of Alpine peaks crowding around the convoluted contours of Lake Lucerne. While going up it was a nice weather but slowly & slowly it started getting dark.
